DataElement.preferredName: Disease Response Neurologic New or Worsening Symptom Intubation Procedure Pressor Support Pseudoprogression Assessment Pseudoprogression Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes or no response indicating whether a patient has been assessed for pseudoprogression which is recognized by worsening symptoms which require intubation and/or pressor support.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response Neurologic New or Worsening Symptom Intubation Procedure Pressor Support Pseudoprogression Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.:Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system._The subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient that can be classified as new or worsening_The insertion of a cannula or tube into a hollow body organ._The use of vasopressor agents to elevate arterial blood pressure._A radiologic finding observed during magnetic resonance imaging of brain glioblastoma, following concurrent radiotherapy and temozolomide treatment or vaccine therapy. It refers to the false positive finding of progression and enhancement of the lesion. It is considered a treatment effect due to tumor cell necrosis and subsequent edema formation and increased vascular permeability._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In medicine, an improvement related to treatment.

Concepts.definition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

Property.preferredName: Neurologic New or Worsening Symptom Intubation Procedure Pressor Support Pseudoprogression Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: (noor-uh-LOJ-ik) Having to do with nerves or the nervous system.:The subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient that can be classified as new or worsening:The insertion of a cannula or tube into a hollow body organ.:No Value Exists:A radiologic finding observed during magnetic resonance imaging of brain glioblastoma, following concurrent radiotherapy and temozolomide treatment. It refers to the false positive finding of progression and enhancement of the lesion. It is considered a treatment effect due to tumor cell necrosis and subsequent edema formation and increased vascular permeability.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.
The subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient that can be classified as new or worsening
The insertion of a cannula or tube into a hollow body organ.
The use of vasopressor agents to elevate arterial blood pressure.

A radiologic finding observed during magnetic resonance imaging of brain glioblastoma, following concurrent radiotherapy and temozolomide treatment or vaccine therapy. It refers to the false positive finding of progression and enhancement of the lesion. It is considered a treatment effect due to tumor cell necrosis and subsequent edema formation and increased vascular permeability.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2023.7.18 Updated def for 'No Value Exists'. ak

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Within 3 weeks of the vaccine
ReferenceDocuments.description: Within 3 weeks of the vaccine, has the patient been assessed for suspected pseudoprogression with worsening neurologic symptoms which require intubation and/or pressor support for >72 hours?
